//This file allows a shader technique to specify which of the available fx parameters
//are usable as normal, hidden from the material form editor, or ignored and hidden.
//Ignored implies hidden
//Alot of the auto generated materials from the level building stuff don't need this file.
//It is mainly for trilight and post and static etc...
TriTex0
	Ignored
		mTexture1
		mSolidColour
		mBones
		mLightViewProj
		mEyePos
		mCelTable
		mShadowTexture
		mShadowLightPos
		mbDirectional
		mShadowAtten
		mSpecColor
		mSpecPower
		mMaterialID
	Hidden
		mTexture1
		mSolidColour
		mBones
		mWorld
		mView
		mProjection
		mLightViewProj
		mEyePos
		mCelTable
		mShadowTexture
		mShadowLightPos
		mbDirectional
		mShadowAtten
		mSpecColor
		mSpecPower
		mMaterialID
